attributes.action: Hold a general election so the uk public can vote for its future on Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: Irrespective of Brexit or no Brexit the people made a democratic vote to leave. Mp’s and parties and even the EU has called Brexit undemocratic ?  If mps and their party believe in democracy now is the time to put it to the vote.
attributes.background: Mp’s are elected by their constituents to represent them. MP’s are not judge and jury on decisions and should not put their personal beliefs before their public.
